myutils 0.1.2
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

apsimng_cultivars()

Get releae cultivars from apsimx

asris_soil()

Download soil file from asris and convert to json which can be used in APSIM NG

chunk()

Generate an vector with size and length

crop_chromosome()

Lists of chromosome for crops

date2doy()

Convert date to DOY

doy2date()

Convert day of year (doy) to date in month and day format

geom_oz()

Geometry of Australia coast and state lines

geom_oz_states()

Geom label for Australian States

install_packages()

Install packages for myself

model_summarise()

Summarise a model with statistics indicators

month_first_day()

First day (day of year) of month

month_first_day_label()

First day of month

nrmse()

Normalized root mean square error (nrmse)

oz_lines()

Lines for Australia

pairwise()

Apply a function to pairwise of all combinations in row or column of a matrix.

pairwise_diff()

Calculate the pairwise difference of all combinations in row or column of a matrix.

rsq()

Squared coefficient of correlation (R2)

run_parallel()

A wrap function to run parallel in different platforms

scale_x_month()

Custom X-axis Scale for first day of months

scale_y_month()

Custom Y-axis Scale for first day of months

silo_grid()

Get gridded data from SILO

slope()

Slope of linear regression

theme_map()

Theme for map

use_petrichor()

Use taskqueue on petrichor
